app.title: DietingWithJoe
app.subtitle: Your personalized meal plan
app.description: Get a personalized meal plan based on your needs, preferences, and health goals with Joe, your nutrition assistant.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content: We collect the data you provide through the conversation with our nutritional assistant, such as name, age, height, weight, health information, and food preferences.

use.title: Data Usage
use.content: We use this data exclusively to create a personalized meal plan and improve our services.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: Your data is stored securely and is not shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or request deletion of your personal data at any time.

contact.title: Privacy Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding your privacy, contact us at privacy@dietingwithjoe.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using DietingWithJoe, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: DietingWithJoe provides a virtual nutritional assistant that creates personalized meal plans based on user-provided information.

accuracy.title: Information Accuracy
accuracy.content: While we strive to provide accurate nutritional information, the generated meal plans do not replace professional advice from doctors or nutritionists.

responsibility.title: User Responsibility
responsibility.content: You are responsible for the accuracy of the information you provide and the appropriate use of the generated meal plans.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: DietingWithJoe is not liable for any damage resulting from the use or inability to use our service.

changes.title: Terms Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: We have several ways for you to contact us and get your questions answered.
